info.description: Hire_Jobs is a platform to find your dream job.
info.title: Hireo Jobs API

get.description: Retrieve all job openings for the authenticated employer

post.description: Retrieves chat details based on the provided request

400.description: Details not in correct format" or "User ID not found in JWT claims" or "Failed to get chat details

get.description: Retrieve details of the company deails with the authenticated employer

put.description: Update details of the company associated with the authenticated employer

get.description: Retrieve the list of applicants for the jobs posted by the employer
Get interviews for a specific job by an employer

400.description: Invalid or missing user ID" or "Invalid job ID

post.description: Create a new job opening for the authenticated employer

get.description: Retrieve a specific job opening for the authenticated employer

put.description: Update a specific job opening for the authenticated employer

delete.description: Delete a specific job opening for the authenticated employer

post.description: Schedule an interview for a jobseeker by an employer

400.description: Invalid or missing user ID" or "Invalid job ID" or "Invalid jobseeker ID" or "Invalid interview date" or "Invalid interview time" or "Invalid interview type

get.description: Processes WebSocket messages for group chat based on the provided group ID

400.description: Missing Authorization header" or "Invalid token" or "Websocket Connection Issue" or "Error reading WebSocket message" or "Details not in correct format

post.description: Submit a job application with a resume and cover letter

400.description: Invalid employer ID type or error in getting resume file

500.description: Failed to save/read resume file or apply for job

post.description: Apply to a job that has been saved by the user

400.description: Invalid or missing user ID" or "Invalid job ID" or "Error in getting resume file

500.description: Failed to check saved jobs" or "Failed to save resume file" or "Failed to read resume file" or "Failed to apply for job

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific job using its ID

post.description: Save a job to the user's list of saved jobs

400.description: Invalid or missing job ID" or "User ID not found" or "Invalid user ID type

get.description: Retrieve a job that has been saved by the user

400.description: User ID not found" or "Invalid user ID type

delete.description: Delete a job from the user's list of saved jobs

400.description: Invalid job ID format" or "Invalid or missing user ID" or "Invalid user ID type

get.description: Retrieve all job openings based on a keyword search for job seekers

post.description: Create a new job seeker account
